title: Seerportal - Password logic changes

labels.name: Type: üí° Enhancement
labels.description: Modify existing functionality for additional features.

labels.name: State: Test in India
labels.description: Issue deployed on India Dev and ready for testing.

labels.name: State: Deploy - India Dev
labels.description: Ready For Deployment to 225 (India Dev)

body:
This will be reflected in the following modules
1. Login
2. New user registration
3. Edit user after bulk upload
4. Change password
5. Bulk upload

Logic

```
let salt = password.substring(0, 2);
crypto.createHash("sha256").update(salt+password).digest('base64');


```

Note: Once this is set or deployed. For all the existing users has to change their password by default during login.

We can also send users a reset password request email

FYI @Kaurgurjot

title: Profile Management - Kafka configuration changes

labels.name: Type: üí° Enhancement
labels.description: Modify existing functionality for additional features.

labels.name: State: Test in India
labels.description: Issue deployed on India Dev and ready for testing.

body:
1. Max length for key and value in Kafka should be 30.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/56965103/196930007-e71f3994-6ad4-4e23-aa63-48f0e19901a7.png)

2. Key accepts only alphabets. Value accepts alphabets and underscore. Need a proper error message. Right now the error message is "Please enter a valid key, Please enter a valid value".  
Please update the error message. 
Add UI error and Backend API error.
Also, instead of a pop-up message, we should show the error message below that field because we cannot make out which key/value has an error from the pop-up message.

kafka key regex    ALPHABETS_WITHOUT_SPACE: /^[A-Za-z]+$/,
kafka value regex    ALPHA_WITH_UNDERSCORE_KAFKA_VALUE: /^[a-z_]+$/,

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/56965103/196930154-2226744b-d5a8-4862-80ff-8635648dccaf.png)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/56965103/196930228-995b2a64-c6c7-4da8-b607-ee63949806a5.png)

title: Alerts- View alert page is showing blank fields

labels.name: Type: üêõBug
labels.description: There is something not working as it should within SeerPortal.

body:
**Tested Date:** 19-10-2022
**Tested By:** Rupali Patil
**Version:** 2.50.0
**Environment:** https://192.168.0.228:3000
**Client:** Dataseers
**User Role/Permission:** Global Admin 
**Module:** Strataseer
**Sub Module:** Alerts
**Bug Details:** 1. View alert- Added new alert but when click on that then getting blank fields 
Note: User have access of 'All Programs' program group

https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/88326395/196632521-6d34248d-7012-4b90-9a5f-432a0999c5b1.mp4

**To Reproduce
Steps to reproduce the behavior:**
1. Login to SeerPortal
2. Navigated to view alerts page
3. Click on alert having processor-Adyen and program- Test
4.  see error

**Expected Behavior:** It should show whole added values.
Browser Details:
OS: [e.g. iOS]
Browser [e.g. chrome, safari]
Version [e.g. 22]

**Other Modules it can affect:** CS, RS, FS

title: Migration to Alter report_name & file_name columns in database

labels.name: State : PR Raised
labels.description: When a developer raises a PR

body:
Migration to Alter report_name & file_name columns in database with table list.

1. alert_history
2. alert_reports
3. alerts
4. audit_logs
5. download_center
6. reports
7. reports_download
8. ach_recon
9. bulk_extract_samplefile
10. compliance_data_masters
11. compliance_master_history
12. conversation_history_file
13. processor_files
14. report_file_content

**Migration:**
[Migration_report_name_n_file_name_varcha_150.txt](https://github.com/dataseers/seerportal/files/9800129/Migration_report_name_n_file_name_varcha_150.txt)


Data validation: 

- **Production database**
Character length in production database is under 150 characters.
![MicrosoftTeams-image (11)](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/91963431/196162262-8481ab46-390b-4015-9ee0-82ee50843778.png)

- **Dev database**
Database - seerportal_india_dev.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/91963431/196162186-fed3d9f5-bdc8-40ce-9d1a-8c9b09cfa276.png)
Two table conversation_history_files & complaint_files requires data modification.
```
SELECT *,length(file_name) FROM conversation_history_files WHERE id=5;
SELECT *,length(file_name) FROM complaint_files WHERE id IN (108,111,116,120,125,130,137,141,144,147,153,161,165,169,175,180,184,87,80,86,90,92);
```
Database - sp_india_dev_antd
![antd_tbls_length](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/91963431/196170672-3020b03b-7fe3-42a7-aa80-283012baf8aa.JPG)
Single table conversation_history_files requires data modification.
`SELECT *,length(file_name) FROM conversation_history_files WHERE id=5;`

title: Audit Logs- Issue related to Download and View icon for User Management

labels.name: Type: üêõBug
labels.description: There is something not working as it should within SeerPortal.

labels.name: State: Deploy - India Dev
labels.description: Ready For Deployment to 225 (India Dev)

labels.name: State: Tested in India
labels.description: Testing performed on India Dev.

body:
**Tested Date:** 17-10-2022
**Tested By:** Rupali Patil
**Version:** 2.50.0
**Environment:** https://192.168.0.228:3000
**Client:** Dataseers
**User Role/Permission:** Global Admin 
**Module:** Admin and Billing
**Sub Module:** Audit Logs
**Bug Details:** 
Issue 1: Audit Log- User management bulk upload- download and view icon: not showing saved value for partially filled sample file. 

https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/88326395/196160397-e3c5daf2-b174-4906-acb1-0a852f28bfb3.mp4

Issue 2: Audit logs- User Management- Able to see password of a user on click of view button and also in downloaded file 
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/88326395/196160666-49085e14-a3ad-4056-9670-01ca088dc9f6.png)


**To Reproduce
Steps to reproduce the behavior:**
1. Login to SeerPortal
2. Navigated to User Management page
3. Download sample file
4. Fill the file partially and upload it
5. Bulk Upload table - click on edit button, make the changes and click on Save all button
6. Navigate to Audit Logs page
7. Click on View/download icon
8.  See error

**Expected Behavior:** 1. It should show saved value for the uploaded record
2. Password should be hidden 

Browser Details:
OS: [e.g. iOS]
Browser [e.g. chrome, safari]
Version [e.g. 22]

**Other Modules it can affect:** Report Management, Alerts

body:
@gjhass We need to create 2 migrations 

The first migration is to create an all-program Id record for all the processors that are present in the system.

program_id | Program name | Issuer |accounts_allowed per program | Program Manager | Program Type | Status 
**all | Do Not Remove |  NA | 1 |  NA |  NA | Testing**

The Second migration is to give permission to the program group
